alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 10:41AM EST until February 22 at 10:37PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Raccoon Creek near Granville. Mill Creek at Evendale. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mill Creek at Evendale. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Canal Road near UPS floods with high water along Kemper and Mosteller Roads near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this afternoon to a crest of 13.3 feet by mid afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
